item.title: 新款 iPhone 16 在俄罗斯亮相，零售商规避苹果出口禁令
item.description: 俄罗斯零售商已经开始预售苹果公司的最新款 iPhone，规避了该公司对俄罗斯的出口禁令，让消费者有机会预购比美国贵数百美元的设备。【原文：Russian retailers have launched pre-sales of Apple's latest iPhone, circumventing the company's export ban to Russia and giving consumers the chance to pre-order devices hundreds of dollars more expensive than in the United States.】

item.title: 消息人士称，AlShaya 星巴克特许经营权出售谈判搁浅
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，科威特 AlShaya 集团出售中东、北非和中亚星巴克特许经营权的计划被搁置。【原文：The sale of a stake in the Middle East, North Africa and central Asia Starbucks franchise operated by Kuwait's AlShaya Group is on hold, two people with knowledge of the process said.】

item.title: 亚洲货币看涨押注稳定，美联储宽松押注令美元走软
item.description: 路透社周四的一项民意调查显示，分析师仍然看好大多数亚洲货币，尽管小幅下调了一些押注，原因是美联储的鸽派态度推动了美元的防御性走势，增强了风险敏感性资产的吸引力。【原文：Analysts remained bullish on most Asian currencies despite marginally dialling back some bets, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday, as a defensive U.S. dollar driven by a dovish Federal Reserve enhanced the appeal of risk-sensitive assets.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴通过发布新的开源模型、文本到视频加速推动人工智能发展
item.description: 中国科技公司阿里巴巴周四发布了新的开源人工智能模型和文本到视频人工智能技术，加大了在蓬勃发展的生成式人工智能领域的竞争力度。【原文：Chinese technology company Alibaba released on Thursday new open-source artificial intelligence models and text-to-video AI technology, intensifying its efforts to compete in the booming area of generative AI.】

item.title: 美联储大幅降息后，美国银行目前预计美联储将在第四季度降息 75 个基点
item.description: 在美国央行于周三启动了人们普遍预期的一系列降息行动之后，博雅全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）将美联储今年剩余时间的降息预期上调至 75 个基点。【原文：BofA Global Research raised its forecast for the Federal Reserve's anticipated interest rate cuts for the remainder of this year to 75 basis points, after the U.S. central bank kicked off a widely expected series of reductions on Wednesday.】

item.title: 预计中国将下调主要政策利率和贷款基准：路透调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，在美联储大幅降息消除了人民币暴跌的部分风险之后，市场普遍预计中国将在周五下调主要政策利率和基准贷款利率。【原文：China is widely expected to trim its main policy and benchmark lending rates on Friday, a Reuters poll showed, after the Federal Reserve's outsized interest rate cut removed some of the risks around sharp yuan declines.】

item.title: 香港调查显示国泰空客发动机故障是由于燃油软管破裂所致
item.description: 香港航空事故调查机构周四的报告称，该机构的调查显示，国泰航空的空中客车 A350 发动机在飞行中因燃油软管损坏而发生故障，而且有起火迹象。【原文：A probe by Hong Kong's aviation accident investigation agency revealed Cathay Pacific's Airbus A350 engine failed in-flight due to a damaged fuel hose which also showed signs of a fire, the agency's report stated on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国将加大政策力度振兴经济，但不会采取 "火箭筒 "式刺激措施
item.description: 分析师和政策顾问说，中国决策者很可能会加大措施力度，至少帮助经济在2024年实现日益具有挑战性的增长目标，同时更加注重刺激需求，以应对持续的通货紧缩压力。【原文：Chinese policymakers will likely step up measures to at least help the economy meet an increasingly challenging growth target for 2024, analysts and policy advisers say, with a sharper focus on boosting demand to fight persistent deflationary pressures.】

item.title: 模拟器件公司与塔塔集团就在印度生产半导体进行谈判
item.description: 美国芯片制造商模拟器件公司（ADI）周三表示，该公司与印度盐到航空企业集团塔塔集团（Tata Group）签署了一项协议，探讨在印度生产半导体产品。【原文：Analog Devices (ADI) and Indian salt-to-aviation conglomerate Tata Group have signed a pact to explore making semiconductor products in India, the U.S. chipmaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 联合国咨询机构就管理人工智能提出七项建议
item.description: 联合国的一个人工智能咨询机构周四发布了其最终报告，提出了解决人工智能相关风险和治理差距的七项建议。【原文：An artificial-intelligence advisory body at the United Nations on Thursday released its final report proposing seven recommendations to address AI-related risks and gaps in governance.】

item.title: 美联储大幅降息引来反应平淡，但平静可能不会持久
item.description: 在美国联邦储备委员会大幅降息后，投资者预期市场会出现剧烈波动，但结果却是反应平淡。这种情况可能稍纵即逝。【原文：Investors who anticipated furious market swings following the U.S. Federal Reserve's bumper rate cut saw more of a muted reaction. That may be fleeting.】

item.title: 美联储巨幅降息后，市场希望寄托于美国经济软着陆
item.description: 近期历史上最重要的一次美联储会议将投资者的焦点集中在一个问题上：央行是否及时启动了降息周期，以防止经济过快放缓。【原文：One of the most consequential Federal Reserve meetings in recent history has put investors’ focus squarely on one question: whether the central bank has kicked off its rate cutting cycle in time to keep the economy from slowing too rapidly.】

item.title: 早间新闻英国通胀将使英国央行保持谨慎
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 欧盟 8 月汽车销量创 3 年新低，电动汽车销量骤降 44
item.description: 汽车行业机构周四的数据显示，受主要市场德国、法国和意大利两位数跌幅以及电动汽车（EV）销量下滑的拖累，8月份欧盟新车销量下降了18.3%，创下三年来的最低水平。【原文：New car sales in the European Union fell 18.3% in August to their lowest in three years, dragged down by double-digit losses in major markets Germany, France and Italy and sliding electric vehicle (EV) sales, auto industry body data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 印尼议会通过普拉博沃的首份预算案
item.description: 印尼国会周四通过了当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的2025年首份预算案，开支定为3,621.3万亿印尼盾（约合2,370亿美元），财政赤字预计占国内生产总值的2.53%。【原文：Indonesia's parliament on Thursday passed President-elect Prabowo Subianto's maiden budget for 2025, with spending set at 3,621.3 trillion rupiah ($237 billion) and the fiscal deficit projected to be 2.53% of gross domestic product.】

item.title: 外媒报道：Waymo 正与现代汽车谈判生产自动驾驶出租车
item.description: 据韩国《电子时报》报道，Alphabet 旗下的 Waymo 正在与韩国现代汽车公司洽谈自动驾驶汽车的外包生产事宜。【原文：Alphabet's Waymo is in talks with South Korea's Hyundai Motor to outsource manufacturing of its self-driving vehicles, South Korean newspaper, Electronic Times, reported.】

item.title: 咖啡种植者希望推迟欧盟的森林砍伐要求
item.description: 世界顶级咖啡组织的负责人周三表示，该组织将要求欧盟推迟执行一项要求，即进口咖啡豆必须来自与森林砍伐无关的地区。【原文：The world's top coffee body is set to request that the European Union postpone a requirement that imported beans come from areas not linked with deforestation, the group's head said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 波音公司与罢工工会的谈判陷入僵局，未能达成协议
item.description: 周三，波音公司与其最大的工会之间的合同谈判陷入僵局，在联邦调解员的见证下，双方未能就关键问题达成协议。【原文：Contract talks between Boeing and its largest union stalled on Wednesday after both sides failed to reach an agreement on key issues in presence of federal mediators.】

item.title: 中国飞机租赁商向波音公司订购 50 架 737 MAX 喷气式飞机
item.description: 国家开发银行金融租赁公司表示，其飞机租赁部门将订购 50 架波音 737 MAX 8 喷气式飞机，这对一直在努力应对中国订单放缓和工厂工人罢工的波音飞机制造商来说是一个鼓舞。【原文：China Development Bank Financial Leasing said its aircraft leasing unit would order 50 Boeing 737 MAX 8 jets, in a boost to the planemaker that has been grappling with a slowdown in Chinese orders and a strike by factory workers.】

item.title: 美联储规划 "软着陆 "路径，股市和美元上涨
item.description: 在美国联邦储备委员会以大幅降息开始其宽松周期之后，美元反弹，长期债券收益率上升，亚洲股市多数上涨，尽管美联储在寻求保持经济正常运行的过程中以平衡的展望缓和了降息。【原文：The dollar bounced, long-dated bond yields were up and Asian stocks mostly rose after the U.S. Federal Reserve began its easing cycle with a large rate cut, though it tempered that with a balanced outlook as it seeks to keep the economy ticking over.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 8 月就业人数超预期增长，失业率保持稳定
item.description: 澳大利亚 8 月份的就业率连续第三个月超过预期，但失业率保持稳定，因为劳动力也在快速扩张，这进一步证实了劳动力市场依然紧张的观点。【原文：Australian employment blew past forecasts for a third straight month in August, yet the jobless rate held steady as the workforce also expanded at a rapid rate, reinforcing the view that the labour market remains tight.】

item.title: 任天堂和口袋妖怪起诉《Palworld》制作商侵犯专利权
item.description: 任天堂和口袋妖怪公司周四表示，已对热门生存冒险游戏《Palworld》的制作商提起专利侵权诉讼。【原文：Nintendo and The Pokemon Company have filed a patent infringement lawsuit against the producer of hit survival adventure game "Palworld", the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国称将就欧盟电动汽车调查 "谈判至最后一刻
item.description: 中国商务部长周三表示，中国政府将继续就欧盟电动汽车调查进行谈判，"直到最后一刻"。【原文：China's commerce minister said on Wednesday that Beijing will continue to negotiate "until the last minute" on the European Union's electric vehicle probe, with the investigation undermining confidence of Chinese companies investing in Europe.】

item.title: 美国降息未能提振市场情绪，油价下跌
item.description: 在美联储降息幅度超过预期引发对美国经济的担忧之后，油价在周四的亚洲交易中下跌。【原文：Oil prices fell in Asian trading on Thursday after a larger-than-expected Federal Reserve interest rate cut sparked concerns about the U.S. economy.】

item.title: 美联储大幅降息后美元反弹
item.description: 美元周四大幅上涨，从早些时候美联储大幅降息后的暴跌中恢复过来，市场已在很大程度上计入了美联储的降息幅度。【原文：The U.S. dollar rose broadly on Thursday, recovering from an earlier tumble in the immediate aftermath of the Federal Reserve's outsized interest rate cut that had been largely priced in by markets.】

item.title: 美国参议院委员会就选举威胁质询科技公司高管
item.description: 美国立法者周三向科技公司高管询问了他们在 11 月大选前应对外国虚假信息威胁的准备情况，参议员和高管都认为大选日前后 48 小时是最脆弱的时期。【原文：U.S. lawmakers questioned tech executives on Wednesday about their preparations for battling foreign disinformation threats ahead of elections in November, with both the senators and executives identifying the 48 hours around Election Day as the most vulnerable time.】

item.title: 福特里弗鲁日工具和模具部门的 UAW 成员设定罢工最后期限
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（UAW）工会周三表示，由于当地的合同问题，该工会已将罢工最后期限定在福特公司位于红河园区的工具和模具部门。【原文：The United Auto Workers (UAW) union said on Wednesday it has set a strike deadline at Ford's tool and die unit in the River Rouge Complex over local contract issues.】

item.title: 独家报道尽管存在法律问题，韩国尹炳世仍对完成捷克核电站协议充满信心
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈（Yoon Suk Yeol）告诉路透社，尽管法国电力公司（EDF）和西屋电气公司（Westinghouse）对在捷克共和国建造一座核电站的数十亿美元项目提出了上诉，但韩国有信心克服任何障碍。【原文：South Korea is confident it can overcome any obstacles to a multi-billion dollar project to build a nuclear plant in the Czech Republic, despite appeals against the deal launched by EDF and Westinghouse, President Yoon Suk Yeol told Reuters.】

item.title: 墨西哥裔美国人媒体公司 TelevisaUnivision 将接替韦德-戴维斯出任首席执行官
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，墨西哥裔美国媒体公司 TelevisaUnivision 的首席执行官将被撤换，该公司整合了两家最大的西班牙语广播公司的内容，预计最快将于周三晚间进行调整。【原文：The chief executive of TelevisaUnivision, a Mexican-American media company that combines content from two of the largest Spanish-language broadcasters, will be replaced, according to two sources with knowledge of the plan, with the shake up expected as soon as Wednesday evening.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美联储大举进攻，市场摇摆不定
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】
